Context: The Tutoring and Learning Centre (TLC) is an academic service at George Brown College, offering tutoring, workshops, and resources for English, math, accounting, and other learning support. The TLC provides various academic learning supports and has locations at each of their campuses. Students can log in with their GBC credentials to book sessions. The TLC helps students develop core academic skills and offers the opportunity for students with strong academic skills to become Peer Tutors. The contact information for the TLC is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The website content may be subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
